website_summaries.verdict: This selection of 14 matte and metallic eyeshadow shades comes infused with real gold as well as skin-smoothing cocoa powder.
pros: Velvety shades are highly pigmented and blend well together
These multifunctional shadows can be applied lightly for daytime use, then layered for evening wear
The gold-infused foil shades are super shiny, while the signature chocolate scent is a mood booster
cons: The colors don't show up as well on deeper skin

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Don’t even want to give a star but have to!!! I wouldn’t buy this product off here. Go to a store that sells this product. WASTE OF MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.author: April K.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful palette. Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in one piece and smells like chocolate. The colors are beautiful and the mirrors pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Miki

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Best product ever smells amazing. The colors are vibrant made with real cocoa you can literally smell it as soon as you open the package. I like that there's many different colors to choose from for a dress hours and occasions. It's my first time purchasing this I've had it for a long time and I use it quite frequently and mix it with other pallets that I have and it last all day and it's very light on your face and I believe it goes with different skin tones I'm tan however I put it on my daughter and she's very fair and it looks beautiful on her as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gia

customer_reviews.title: My go-to palette
customer_reviews.text: An incredibly versatile palette that I find myself using constantly! I very rarely have an eyeshadow look where I don’t use at least one shadow in this palette. They’re deeply pigmented and easy to apply. A little goes a long way. I do hate the scent, though, as it’s very saccharine and a little nauseating. I also keep dropping this palette for some reason, like I can’t get a good grip on it, and the shadows are very fragile so you can lose half of the palette in one good fall. But it’s such a useful palette that I couldn’t stand to be without it, so I purchased another.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I love this palette, but one of my shadows was completely busted and got all over everything. Luckily, it was the color I was LEAST likely to ever use. Other than that, it was PERFECT. And it smells great!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Fortenberry

customer_reviews.title: Yay!!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg I’m loving this pallet. I’m so happy I took the chance to buy it off here and at a great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty shadows
customer_reviews.text: I actually like this palette but I am enraged by the fact that what was sent to me was obviously previously owned. One of the colors is badly damaged and the package is sticky and covered with bits of tape (maybe from someone else's Christmas present???) Too bad, this might have been a fave.
customer_reviews.author: Make up lady

customer_reviews.title: Love this eyeshadow set
customer_reviews.text: I've never used too faced before but I absolutely love this eyeshadow palette. I also love that it comes with a few instructions to use different colors together.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R.

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! it smells amazing pigments are really nice they don't crease! love it!
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate sparkle
customer_reviews.text: The colors are soooo pretty and blendable. The pallet smells like chocolate. DELISH!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I loveeeee this pallet. I’m not the type of person to write a review unless I really love it or I really hate it but I must say that I’m very glad I bought this, well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: latorra

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors and the scent. Pretty case love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shewanda Harris

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and the smell of chocolate is my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I saw this eye palette everywhere and I decided to buy it for myself. Very good quality and the smell of chocolate is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Rocket Queen

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Came packaged well plus bubble wrap the pallete is big nice quality and really smell like chocolate
customer_reviews.author: Traylonte

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Just beautiful colors, great eye shadows texture, great aroma and nice package. Perfect product . Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Customer.

customer_reviews.title: Could of been better...
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with the package it was missing the plastic film cover when I opened the eyeshadow palette. It also appeared to have a smudge on the gold eyeshadow color. Regardless it has beautiful eyeshadow colors and great pigment.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Placencia

customer_reviews.title: AUTHENTIC
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! Definitely the real product.. arrived unbroken and gorgeous
customer_reviews.author: Simae Rose

customer_reviews.title: Broken Eyeshadow
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 of these for christmas as gifts and one of them arrived broken!
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I LIVE for this pallet. Its nice, creamy, and smells amazing. And yes, it’s the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee D

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: So in love with great eye shadow smells like chocolate love too faced really pigmented colors great quality
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Phillips

customer_reviews.title: the perfect eye pallette
customer_reviews.text: it's got it all, whatever suits your fancy for good-looking eyes. Absolutely loved the product and the pretty case!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Rose

customer_reviews.title: Stays on all day!
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but colors really pop and stays on all day. I would give it 5-stars except for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S Barr

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!!!! Beautiful colors, true as depicted. Smooth application. Added bonus....it does have a chocolate fragrance. I am thinking I ought to order a backup just in case Too Faced decides to discontinue.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: The product was crushed
customer_reviews.text: This product was completely crushed and messed up .There is no way it can be used by anyone
customer_reviews.author: Ije King

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: Shadows were smashed. What a mess. Totally dissatisfied and what a hassle to clean up
customer_reviews.author: carter

customer_reviews.title: My favorite eyeshadow pallet!
customer_reviews.text: This caught my eye in a brick and mortar store and was so happy to find it on Amazon! It is a spectacular eyeshadow pallet in every way!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Shimmer to perfection
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this palate! Very pigmented, and smells delicious. Will definitely be trying other palates.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: I received the item broken and my favorite green shade and one of the shimmer shades were all over the box. Had no protective wrapping.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Hardman

customer_reviews.title: Broken product
customer_reviews.text: Just received this today. Came broken. Pretty sure it was already broken b4 it got into the hands of the shipping service due to the condition of the box. What a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Fast delivery and the palette came in one piece, nothing was broken
customer_reviews.author: Eve Pleasant

customer_reviews.title: No shadows were shattered
customer_reviews.text: Love this pallet nothing was shattered everything intacted. Can’t wait to try it this weekend. Colors look amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: TRACEY

customer_reviews.title: Love this palette!
customer_reviews.text: Love this palette!! Definitely the real deal! Smells and looks on point!! My favorite by far!!
customer_reviews.author: Misty Asplund

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: amazing!! everything came perfectly packaged and the scent is So Good 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Valentina

customer_reviews.title: Great colors
customer_reviews.text: Great to add the pop of color to your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza Sienkiewicz

customer_reviews.title: My favorite eyeshadow palette
customer_reviews.text: I love this pallette. My husband bought it for me as a birthday gift. I did my eyeshadow using this pallette on my birthday and received compliments on how flawless my makeup looked. Too Faced has always been my favorite eyeshadow palette due to the great pigmentation and the beautiful earth tones. I love the shimmer that comes with the colors as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tow86

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous pallette!
customer_reviews.text: This pallette of eye shadows are gorgeous however the seller (Jobs for America) sold me counterfeit makeup. It was very upsetting. It was obviously fake, cheap packaging in a box and metal tin, which included spelling mistakes and poor lettering, not like the real thing at all.
customer_reviews.author: Party Rocker

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great eye palette. The colors are vivid they go on smoothly. It was great for the holidays and I know I'll be wearing them for a night out. Love them, get lots of compliments, ordered another one as a gift for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Texan

customer_reviews.title: A
customer_reviews.text: This palette Is so awsome.... It's nails and tastes just like chocolate. The Pigmentation is perfect And I love it
customer_reviews.author: neek

customer_reviews.title: This is the real deal! Gorgeous palette
customer_reviews.text: Great pigments and such fine glitter. Just a little goes a long way and lasts all day
customer_reviews.author: Anne S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Buy it. I promise you won’t be disappointed, this pallete is amazing!!! And smells like chocolate too
customer_reviews.author: Ash

product_meta.title: Too Faced Chocolate Gold Eyeshadow Palette
product_meta.description: ***** Ship within USA ***** Tans new in the box, 100%authentic, US seller! 16 Shades! This will be packaged in a box with bubble wrap to avoid damage. Metallic shades infused with real gold for extra sparkle. Creamy matte shadows offer soft, velvety wear. ***** Ship within USA ***** Delivery in 5-7 business day
feature_bullets: eye palette,16 Shades, Limited edition, Gold and Metalloc, Delivery in 5-7 business day
